TenantSecurityMobilePolicyTrend.name: TenantSecurityMobilePolicyTrend
TenantSecurityMobilePolicyTrend.description: Stores metrics related to changes in mobile security policies across all tenants in Security Center.

Action.description: The change made to the mobile security policy. For example, a new policy was added, updated, or removed.

ActionBy.description: The user who made the change.

ActionDate.description: The date and time of the mobile security policy change.

ConnectedApp.description: The app that is associated with the mobile security policy.

DetailIdentifier.description: The ID of the individual detail record. This field is unique across all tenants.

EffectiveDate.description: The date a mobile security policy is enforced.

IsEnabled.description: A value indicating whether the mobile security policy is enabled. The default is false, which means policies are disabled.

MetricIdentifier.description: The foreign key of the metric.

MetricsType.description: The type of mobile security policy data collected.

MobilePlatform.description: The mobile operating system of the mobile security policy.

Name.description: The name of the metric for which data is collected.

PolicyType.description: The type of mobile security policy. For example, Block Calendar.

RuleValue.description: The value of the security notification rule.

RuleValueType.description: The type of rule value. For example, boolean or text.

SeverityLevel.description: The severity level of the security threat. For example, CRITICAL.

TenantSecurityMobilePolicyTrend.accessRules: This object can only be read and queried.
